name: ListeriosisTestsForListeriaSpeciesInSpecimenFromNormallySterileSiteByCultureAndIdentificationMethod
title: Listeriosis (Tests for Listeria species in Specimen from Normally Sterile Site by Culture and Identification Method)
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains codes for laboratory test names associated with detecting the presence of Listeria species in Specimen from a Normally Sterile Site),(Data Element Scope: Laboratory tests names that were ordered or observed.),(Inclusion Criteria: VSAC query: Listeria species culture or isolate),(Exclusion Criteria: None)
